description: Pydantic models for API request/response documentation related to test case import and management.

classes.name: ImportPreviewRow
classes.description: Model representing a preview row for imported test cases, including suite name, case id, title, description, priority, category, subcategory, preconditions, steps, expected result, and tags.

classes.name: ImportTestPlanResponse
classes.description: Model representing the response after importing a test plan, including counts of created suites and test cases, skipped duplicates, warnings, and a preview list.

classes.name: SuiteListItem
classes.description: Model representing a suite with its database id, name, creation timestamp, and test case count.

classes.name: SuitesListResponse
classes.description: Model representing a list of suite items.

classes.name: TestCaseListItem
classes.description: Model representing a test case with database id, suite id, optional case id, title, priority, category, subcategory, and creation timestamp.

classes.name: TestCasesPageResponse
classes.description: Model representing a paginated response of test case items, total count, page info, and applied filters.
